name: In the Works (William VB, Trevor Dodd, Syntoca, mcfearless999, chrom4t1c)
name_original: In the Works (William VB, Trevor Dodd, Syntoca, mcfearless999, chrom4t1c)
description:
Inspired by the JRPGs of yesteryear,  follow our protagonist, the intern, as they explore the upcoming (and in development) game "The Kingdom of Frogs".   Help The Intern convince NPCs within the game  to take their roles through battles of wit and conversation and meet the Monday deadline.

This was an entry for the 2022 Game-Off game jam with theme being "cliche". We incorporated this theme through our story line and some of our mechanics, such as our use of a jrpg style like battle system and through the conversions with the npcs. 

Chris McPherson: Team Manager/ Producer 

Courtney Jeffs:  3D Modeling / Textures

Fissher:  Contributing Artist

Charles Haitkin:  UI Designer 

Syntoca: Audio Engineer: / Audio Lead

Rory Pattrson:  Writer 

Trevor Dodd: Composer 

William VB: Developer/Director/Programmer

DevNotes: This game will be slowly improved a pone for the month of December 2022. A Linux version is in the works and we are seeing what we can do for Mac.
